comment: A function is bijective if a "retraction" and a "section" exist, see comments for ~ fcof1 and ~ fcofo . Formerly part of proof of ~ fcof1o . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
